Text: Thanks again for your efforts. I have a slow connection, so the way you are doing it now is great for me..... I don't know about all the others though.

Personally, video ruins it for me anyway... to be honest, I'd rather be taping it on cassette from an AM broadcast, lol. I'm a technophile, but when it comes to talk radio, that scratchy old AM dial is where it's at if you ask me.
